name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing high-performance applications, particularly focusing on **AI** solutions and **distributed systems**. Proficient in **Python** and experienced in integrating modern technologies such as **Go** and **C/C++**. Adept at containerization and **microVM** deployment for scalable systems. Demonstrated expertise in building applications that support predictive analytics and real-time processing.
Skilled in delivering robust and compliant solutions, adhering to industry standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. Strong hands-on experience in both frontend and backend development, utilizing **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, along with strong foundations in MLOps leveraging **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** for model training and orchestration. Proven track record in implementing **CI/CD pipelines**, cloud-native systems on **AWS**, **Azure**, and advancing projects with microservices and event-driven architectures.
